description: This file provides a helper module for interacting with an SQLite database, including schema creation, connection management, and basic query operations such as fetching all records, fetching single records, and executing commands for users, jobs, and progress data in the context of a career path navigator backend.

methods.name: None _ensure_schema(conn: sqlite3.Connection)
methods.description: Creates the database tables for users, jobs, and progress if they do not already exist.

methods.name: get_conn()
methods.description: Context manager that establishes a SQLite connection, ensures schema is initialized, and handles connection closing.

methods.name: list[dict[str,Any]] fetch_all(conn: sqlite3.Connection, query: str, params: Iterable[Any])
methods.description: Executes a query and returns all matching rows as a list of dictionaries.

methods.name: Optional[dict[str,Any]] fetch_one(conn: sqlite3.Connection, query: str, params: Iterable[Any])
methods.description: Executes a query and returns a single row as a dictionary, or None if no match.

methods.name: None execute(conn: sqlite3.Connection, query: str, params: Iterable[Any])
methods.description: Executes a command (such as insert, update, delete) and commits changes.

ctags.name: execute
ctags.pattern: /^def execute(conn: sqlite3.Connection, query: str, params: Iterable[Any]) -> None:$/

ctags.name: fetch_all
ctags.pattern: /^def fetch_all(conn: sqlite3.Connection, query: str, params: Iterable[Any]) -> list[dict[str, Any/

ctags.name: fetch_one
ctags.pattern: /^def fetch_one(conn: sqlite3.Connection, query: str, params: Iterable[Any]) -> Optional[dict[str,/
